All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AppEntryPoint
Entry point for all game.
GameAppleList
Manages the list of apples in the game.
GameController
Controller for the Game scene.
GameOverController
Controller for the Game Over scene.
GamePoint
Represents a point in a 2D coordinate system.
GameSnake
Represents the snake in the game.
GameVector
Enum representing movement directions as vectors.
GameView
Utility class for managing the game view.
GameView.CellColor
Enum representing the available cell colors.
GameWinController
 
Json
Utility class for JSON serialization and deserialization using Jackson.
JsonSerializable
Interface for classes which will be used for serializing.
MenuController
Controller for the Menu scene.
ModelContract
Interface for classes that will be integrated into the model enum.
ModelEnum
Enum class for singletones ModelFragments.
ModelGame
Represents the game model, managing the game state, including the snake, apples, and field.
ModelSettings
The ModelSettings class is responsible for managing game settings.
ParsingException
Custom exception to handle errors that occur during the parsing of input data.
SceneEnum
Enum with available scenes.
ScenesControllerContract
Interface for Controllers that require access to the ScenesManager.
ScenesManager
Scene manager class.
SettingsController
Controller for the settings scene.
SettingsRecord
Settings record class.
